go_data.term: negative regulation of NF-kappaB transcription factor activity
go_data.justification: I-TRAF inhibits TRAF2-mediated NF-kappaB activation by blocking the recruitment of TRAF2 to the receptor complex.
I-TRAF is not recruited to the cognate receptor-TRAF signaling complex, suggesting it may be located in the cytoplasm.
I-TRAF is a novel TRAF-interacting protein that regulates TRAF-mediated signal transduction.
